2019年，我回到了守望先锋，

我讨厌这个游戏，可我还是偶尔上线，我喜欢这游戏，可我再也不会长时间的玩下去。

另外科比·布莱恩特，出生于美国宾夕法尼亚州费城，美国已故篮球运动员，司职得分后卫/小前锋1996年NBA选秀，科比于第1轮第13顺位被夏洛特黄蜂队选中并被交易至洛杉矶湖人队，整个NBA生涯都效力于洛杉矶湖人队；共获得5次NBA总冠军、1次NBA常规赛MVP、2次NBA总决赛MVP、4次NBA全明星赛MVP、2次NBA赛季得分王；共入选NBA全明星首发阵容18次、NBA最佳阵容15次（其中一阵11次、二阵2次、三阵2次）、NBA最佳防守阵容12次（其中一阵9次、二阵3次​）

泥马暴雪真是狗娘养的

As someone who has played this game since launch... most of the negative things that all these bad Steam reviews say about it are true. The monetisation (still largely cosmetic, but not completely), the lack of content in updates, the behaviour of the company.

BUT from the perspective of a new player, just installing a hero shooter on Steam, it's pretty good. It has polish. Me and my friends still play this game together regularly, and although we complain it's because we care enough TO complain. 

Just install it and have fun. Or don't. But some of these reviews are quite unfair, so I thought I'd try to add some balance.

P.S. Yes, the monetisation is bad from the perspective of old players, who got everything for free for years, but compared to other multiplayer games it's pretty standard. I'm not saying it's good. I'm just saying that every other online game I've ever played also charges 20 REAL LIFE DOLLARS for one cosmetic and no-one is review bombing them for it. Perhaps we should.

P.P.S. I've never wanted an Overwatch story mode. I never believed that it would be particularly good if they made it, and now that it's been cancelled I really don't care. For years I just wanted the developers to balance the game in a way that made any kind of sense to average players. Mostly I just wanted them to stop buffing Genji.

傻逼游戏，谁玩谁小丑

Overwatch players had been waiting for 2 years with barely any updates to OW1. Here's what they've got in OW2:

- Loot boxes, which used to provide rewarding & nearly infinite progression to all OW1 players, were replaced with battle passes. Now if you want to be rewarded, you have to pay money every 2 months & turn your game into a part-time job, because the pass will expire at the end of a season.

- New Heroes are now locked behind battle passes. A major aspect of Overwatch's core gameplay is switching heroes & adapting to the situation. This change goes against that core gameplay, put new players & those who don't want to pay money in a major disadvantage.

- PVE, the major selling point of Overwatch 2, was cancelled. Blizzard is now asking you $15 for a handful of missions, with no features teased during OW2's development such as skill trees.

Can't believe I'm gonna write this, but I miss Jeff Kaplan, I miss loot boxes. I'd rather learn C++ & Data structures instead of playing this "sequel".
We live in a timeline where our favorite game franchises are being ruined by greed. We're in the wrong timeline, lads.

2016年，我考上了大学，买了人生中第一款游戏《守望先锋》，当时花了199元，半年后又补了典藏包，守望先锋陪伴了我4年大学时间以及毕业后的1年多时间，不得不说守望先锋是一款很好的游戏，但是这几年守望先锋的策划不断作死，退一出二，关闭国服，甚至暴雪明目张胆多次针对中国大陆出现歧视性政策，使我由深深的喜欢变为更加深深的厌恶以及生理不适。
暴雪所作所为有目共睹，在此真诚的祝愿暴雪死妈，如果我是你妈，我立马吸粪自杀，傻逼暴雪不得好死

猫

从前，我养了一只猫，我有十块钱，会用八块钱给它买吃的，经常给它洗澡，它也很粘我。

后来，我带它出去玩，路人觉得它很可爱，他们给它喂猫粮，火腿肠，我很不开心，因为它是我的。我想把它抱回家，可是它挣脱我，冲着给它好吃的人喵喵，我抱了几次他都不跟我走，还挠伤了我，于是我转身就走了.....

后来，偶然在路上遇到了它，它身上脏兮兮的。路人们只会给它好吃的，陪它玩玩，却不会带它回家，给它洗澡。它看到我后就跟着我回家，我把它关在了门外，它在门外喵喵地叫着，叫的我很难受，
可是我不会再要它了
。

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.
